message: I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! I think you'll really love it.
Thank you for the offer, Alice, but $180 is a bit higher than I'm willing to go. I'm really interested in the product, but I can only offer $120 at this time.
I understand that $180 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer you a discount, but I need to make a profit, so I'll meet you at $160.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $160 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go to $135.  Let's see if we can find a compromise.

I can see you're really interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you at a price that's closer to what you're willing to pay. I'll come down to $145, but I need to make a profit, so this is as low as I can go.
